scripts.test:env: npm i && powershell Remove-Item ./test/mongolog.* && concurrently "mongod --logpath test/mongolog.json --quiet --port 27017 --dbpath C:/data/db" "npx nodemon ./src/main.ts test"
scripts.test:seed: npm i && powershell Remove-Item ./test/mongolog.* && concurrently "mongod --logpath test/mongolog.json --quiet --port 27017 --dbpath C:/data/db" "node test/seed.ts" "npx nodemon ./src/main.ts test"
